Privacy Policy

Effective Date: June 10, 2025

This Privacy Policy describes how we, Anisha & Ashwin ("we", "us", or "our"), collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use our MicroSaaS products available on anishaashwin.github.io.

1. Information We Collect

  • Your name and email (only if provided via contact forms or purchases)
  • Technical data such as browser type, IP address, and usage logs
  • Cookies to remember preferences and usage analytics

2. How We Use Your Data

  • To provide and improve our MicroSaaS tools
  • To communicate updates or responses
  • To comply with legal obligations

3. Data Protection

We do not sell your data. Data may be shared with third-party tools like payment providers or analytics services. We implement encryption and access control to protect your information.

4. Cookies

Cookies help us improve performance and personalize user experience. You can disable them in your browser settings.

5. Your Rights

You can request to access, update, or delete your data by emailing us at ashwin.shekher@gmail.com .

6. Changes

This policy may be updated. The latest version will always be available on this page.

7. Contact

Email: ashwin.shekher@gmail.com
